thread.title: 'Game of Thrones' Actor Alfie Allen Joins Shane Black's 'The Predator' (Exclusive)
thread.title_full: 'Game of Thrones' Actor Alfie Allen Joins Shane Black's 'The Predator' (Exclusive)

title: 'Game of Thrones' Actor Alfie Allen Joins Shane Black's 'The Predator' (Exclusive)
text:
11:20am PT by Borys Kit 'Game of Thrones' Actor Alfie Allen Joins Shane Black's 'The Predator' (Exclusive) Frazer Harrison/Getty Alfie Allen The Twentieth Century Fox movie began shooting Monday in Vancouver 
Alfie Allen, who plays Theon Greyjoy in HBO’s Game of Thrones , has joined the cast of Shane Black’s reboot of Predator . 
The Twentieth Century Fox movie began shooting Monday in Vancouver, with Boyd Holdbrook ( Logan ) leading an ensemble that also includes Room star Jacob Tremblay, Sterling K Brown, Keegan-Michael Key, Trevante Rhodes, Thomas Jane and Olivia Munn. 
Black co-wrote the script with Fred Dekker and is directing the movie, titled The Predator . 
Allen will play an ex-Marine who teams with several other outsiders, including one played by Holbrook, to stop the human-hunting creatures in a setting that hasn’t been seen in a Predator movie: suburbia. 
On top of being known for his work on Thrones , Allen also memorably played a Russian gangster who kills the wrong dog in 2014’s John Wick . 
He is repped by UTA, Untitled, and UK’s The Artists Partnership. Borys Kit
